desc: Time to ditch the overwhelm? Get organised and turn your goals into reality! The Key Planner lets you understand what you desire, set goals you like to achieve, track your habits, take control of your time, schedule and to-do list. ALL in one place, The Key Planner is' your success coach in a paper planner and/or APP.

layout.text: The Key Planner App is your daily planner APP designed to help you get organize and automate your success towards achieving your goals each day.
